entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
